name: Tomatito
description: '''José Fernández Torres''' (born [[Fondón]], 1958), known professionally as '''Tomatito''', is a Spanish roma [[flamenco]] guitarist and composer. Having started his career accompanying famed flamenco singer [[Camarón de la Isla]] (with [[Paco de Lucía]]), he has made a number of collaborative albums and six solo albums, two of which have won [[Latin Grammy Award]]s.
